ControlBlock.Description: Moves a three-axis, two-dimensional coordinate system, referenced to the stator, onto a two-axis system, keeping the same reference.

Implementation.Name: FiP16
Implementation.Author: Stef
Implementation.Description: 16 Bit Fixed Point Implementation (use MCHP dsp if possible)
